reviews module

class reviews.app.Review(customer_username, product_name, rating, comment)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents a review left by a customer for a product.

Parameters:

  • id (int) – Unique identifier for the review.

  • customer_username (str) – Username of the customer who wrote the review.

  • product_name (str) – Name of the product being reviewed.

  • rating (int) – Rating given to the product, between 1 and 5.

  • comment (str) – Optional comment provided by the customer.

  • is_moderated (bool) – Indicates if the review has been moderated.

  • is_approved (bool) – Indicates if the review has been approved.

  • timestamp (datetime) – Date and time when the review was created.

comment

query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

reviews.app.delete_review(customer_username, review_id)[source]

Delete a review.

Allows a customer to delete their own review or an admin to delete any review.

Parameters:

  • customer_username (str) – Username of the customer attempting the deletion.

  • review_id (int) – ID of the review to delete.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or failure.

Return type:

flask.Response

error (Exception) – The error object.

Returns:

JSON response with error details.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.app.get_customer_reviews(customer_username)[source]

Get all reviews written by a customer.

Retrieves all reviews submitted by a specific customer.

Parameters:

customer_username (str) – Username of the customer.

Returns:

JSON list of reviews.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.app.get_product_reviews(product_name)[source]

Get all approved reviews for a product.

Retrieves all reviews for a specific product that have been approved by an admin.

Parameters:

product_name (str) – Name of the product.

Returns:

JSON list of reviews.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.app.get_review_details(review_id)[source]

Get details of a specific review.

Retrieves all information about a specific review, regardless of its approval status.

Parameters:

review_id (int) – ID of the review.

Returns:

JSON object with review details.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.app.moderate_review(admin_username, review_id)[source]

Moderate a review (admin only).

Allows an admin to approve or reject a review.

Parameters:

  • admin_username (str) – Username of the admin performing moderation.

  • review_id (int) – ID of the review to moderate.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or failure.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.app.submit_review(customer_username)[source]

Submit a new review for a product.

This endpoint allows a logged-in customer to submit a review for a product they have purchased.

Parameters:

customer_username (str) – Username of the customer submitting the review.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or failure.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.app.update_review(customer_username, review_id)[source]

Update an existing review.

Allows a customer to update their own review. Only the rating and comment can be updated.

Parameters:

  • customer_username (str) – Username of the customer attempting the update.

  • review_id (int) – ID of the review to update.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or failure.

Return type:

flask.Response
